meta.article_title: December 13, 2021 - Attacking the Middle is Different and Often Better Than Attacking the Corners

attacking_middle.probleme: Intermediate and advanced intermediate players under-use the middle attacking tactic

debutant.proposition: Go more towards the forehand if they cover the middle with backhand, and vice versa

exercices_complementaires.description: Concentrate on shots from the middle; don't guard against extreme angled returns

metriques_progression.repere: Mistakes decreased due to indecision when the opponent decides which shot to use

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Don't get stuck in a corner; play the middle for an edge
